purpose: Provide a curated list of Akash deployment examples to help users deploy applications on the Akash network.
principle: Organizes and categorizes various deployment examples and resources for the Akash decentralized cloud platform.
reusability: The repository serves as a reference guide, making it easy for developers to find and use deployment examples for Akash.
limitations: The list is dependent on community contributions and may not cover all possible deployment scenarios or be up-to-date with the latest Akash features.
name: awesome-akash
description: Awesome List of Akash Deployment Examples
